promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic dragonfly dark-type pokemon with a white crystal core. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or dragonfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptalinx, a a massive epic dragonfly dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Doom Crush, Electrical Signal. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragonfly", "dark" or "Cryptalinx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, dragonfly-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This ominous behemoth haunts crypt-like landscapes, using Doom Crush to pulverize foes. Guided by unseen bursts of Electrical Signal, its eerily intricate patterns glow in murkiness.
